text: (And those who came (into the faith) after them) after the first Emigrants (say: Our Lord Forgive us) our sins (and our brethren who were before us in the faith) and migration, (and place not in our hearts any rancour) or resentful envy (towards those who believe) among the Emigrants. (Our Lord! Thou art Full of Pity, Merciful) they made these supplications because they were afraid of resentful envy, because the Prophet (pbuh) gave the spoils to the first Emigrants and did not give them anything.
